name: Senior Front-end developer
description:
Parallels Remote Application Server is a virtual application and desktop delivery solution allowing to access and use applications and data from any device. From engineering perspective it's a technically challenging and interesting project, involving many programming languages, distributed across several operating systems and platforms, working on-prem or in the cloud.

If you’re ambitious and thrive on working with the world’s big company to solve tough problems together with a smart, motivated team, you would want to work here.

We are on the lookout for a Senior Front-end Developer to join our RAS Web Team, who is responsible for RAS web components which includes a full Remote Access web client and Administration Portal.

Our stack: Vue.js, TypeScript, Jest.

Responsibilities

  • Be able to work on the front-end aspects of the application
  • Design of the overall architecture of the web components
  • Implementation of APIs
  • Code optimization with focus on performance and scalability
  • Awareness of security and data protection

Requirements

  • Minimum of 3 years work experience
  • Proficient understanding of JavaScript and Typescript, JavaScript libraries and frameworks such as Vue.js, React, Angular etc.
  • Good understanding of HTML5, CSS3 and SASS
  • Experience in designing, implementing and using WebSockets and RESTful web services
  • Basic knowledge of Node.js
  • Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
  • Ability to implement automated testing platforms and unit tests
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (Git)
  • Proficient understanding of tracking and project management tools (Jira/BitBucket/Confluence)
  • Good time management, and problem-solving skills
  • Good level of written and spoken English

Knowledge and actual experience in any of the following is a plus

  • Experience developing in Vue.js
  • Experience developing in TypeScript
  • Experience in Agile development

Compensation package:

  • Good compensation and benefits
  • Medical and dental insurance
  • Corporate doctor at the office
  • Remote working
